project.name: MapComplete Fireplaces and barbeques
project.description: Outdoor place to make a fire or a fixed barbecue in an official place

tags.description: The MapComplete theme Fireplaces and barbeques has a layer Firepit showing features with this tag

Layer 'Firepit' shows id~.+ with a fixed text, namely 'You just created this element! Thanks for sharing this info with the world and helping people worldwide.' (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques') (This is only shown if _backend~.+ & _last_edit:passed_time<300 & (_version_number= | _version_number=1))

The layer 'Firepit allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Firepit allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Firepit allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Firepit allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'Firepit allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'Firepit' shows access=yes with a fixed text, namely 'Public' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'Firepit' shows access=no with a fixed text, namely 'No access' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'Firepit' shows access=private with a fixed text, namely 'Private' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'Firepit' shows access=permissive with a fixed text, namely 'Access until revoked' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'Firepit' shows access=customers with a fixed text, namely 'Access only for customers' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'Firepit' shows access=permit with a fixed text, namely 'Access only for authorized' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'Firepit' shows seasonal=no with a fixed text, namely 'Available all around the year' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'Firepit' shows seasonal=summer with a fixed text, namely 'Only available in summer' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')

Layer 'Firepit' shows seasonal=spring;summer;autumn with a fixed text, namely 'Closed during the winter' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
The MapComplete theme Fireplaces and barbeques has a layer BBQ showing features with this tag

Layer 'BBQ' shows id~.+ with a fixed text, namely 'You just created this element! Thanks for sharing this info with the world and helping people worldwide.' (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques') (This is only shown if _backend~.+ & _last_edit:passed_time<300 & (_version_number= | _version_number=1))

The layer 'BBQ allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'BBQ allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'BBQ allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'BBQ allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary

The layer 'BBQ allows to upload images and adds them under the 'panoramax'-tag (and panoramax:0, panoramax:1, ... for multiple images). Furthermore, this layer shows images based on the keys panoramax, image, wikidata, wikipedia, wikimedia_commons and mapillary
Layer 'BBQ' shows access=yes with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue can be used by anyone' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'BBQ' shows access=no with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue can't be used by anyone' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'BBQ' shows access=private with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue is private' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')

Layer 'BBQ' shows access=permissive with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue can be used by anyone, but the owner can revoke access at any time' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')

Layer 'BBQ' shows access=customers with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue can only be used by customers' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')

Layer 'BBQ' shows access=permit with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue can only be used by authorized persons' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'BBQ' shows covered=no with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue is not covered' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'BBQ' shows covered=yes with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue is covered' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'BBQ' shows fuel=wood with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue uses wood as fuel' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'BBQ' shows fuel=charcoal with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue uses charcoal as fuel' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')

Layer 'BBQ' shows fuel=electric with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue is powered by electricity' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
Layer 'BBQ' shows fuel=gas with a fixed text, namely 'This barbecue uses gas as fuel' and allows to pick this as a default answer (in the mapcomplete.org theme 'Fireplaces and barbeques')
